# 1. Introduction


Merchandise Trade data collated by the Department of Statistics Singapore, comprising of total imports/ exports since January 1976, is published on [here](https://www.singstat.gov.sg/find-data/search-by-theme/trade-and-investment/merchandise-trade/latest-data). The data is segregated into various regions and countries.
